convertToApiRequest

public static ApiRequest convertToApiRequest(URI uri,
                                             org.apache.http.HttpRequest httpRequest,
                                             List<Cookie> cookies)
Transforms an HttpRequest object to an ApiRequest.
For more convenience, this function takes the uri of the request as URI parameter because it is much easier to use than the String uri which is contained in the HttpRequest object.

Parameters:
the - uri of the request in URI object
httpRequest - apache request object
cookies - cookies used by the http client to make the request
Returns:
Throws:
URISyntaxException
